name: Sorting Radioactive Trash
description:
You just got a ✨ shiny ✨ new job at the local recycling centre ♻️. Too bad their main client is a giant nuclear power plant and their thrash isn't really the healthiest to be around🚮. Good luck tho 🗑️

Controls:

WASD - Move
Spacebar - Jump
LMB - Catch item
RMB - Use scanner
F - Toggle fullscreen
R - Restart

Make sure to share your highscore in the comments!

This game won a gamejam at my university btw, I wanna thank everyone who has participated in the event, it was great fun!
